website_summaries.verdict: Sitting at the top of many a wish list, this feature-rich kitchen playset keeps kids occupied for hours “cooking” for, feeding, and bathing their doll.
pros: Loaded with accessories, including pots and pans, utensils, feeding and drinking items, high chair
Plenty of features to keep little ones occupied for hours
Compact size doesn’t take up much space
cons: May take some time to put together
Getting a Baby Alive doll (not included) in and out of the high chair can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter screamed when she received this for her birthday. She wanted a playset for years but has a terrible history of playing with her bigger toys and then rapidly losing interest. So far, she has played with this every day for the past two weeks. Easy to put together and combining both a kitchen and a bathroom into one, this is a simple but imaginative choice for the Baby Alive fans. I knocked a star off because there was a shipping failure (meaning due to the seller not shipping this out, for whatever reason, in a reasonable Prime 2 day window) and my girl not receiving this until after her birthday. That was not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Plum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect surprise
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it! cery easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know about this until doing some research on Baby Alive because my daughter loves them. She has several different Baby Alive dolls. I knew this was perfect! She was so excited! She plays with it everyday. It can be used as a kitchen, bath, and has high chair for doll to sit! Was simple to put together. Just a lot of interlocking pieces. Overall, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Baby Alive cuteness
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute play center for the baby doll aficionado in your life, however; a word of caution: it is small, cheap plastic and cardboard. This thing is super lightweight and it’s cute, but don’t except much life if you have a child like me that has energy and brothers 😂😂 the food “boxes” were destroyed in an hour. The item is great for her baby alive dolls and she loves babies! So it’s a cute toy for sure. Don’t pay over $37 for it though!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Packed with fun play set that will last with its quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s been nearly a year since we’ve bought it and it’s still a favorite for our twins. It’s very well made , easy to follow instructions so I had it together in no time. It came with a bunch of Accessories and stickers to make it super fun. They still play with it regularly through the week. This will definitely last and be past down to another child. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cantrech23

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers and smaller childern
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this. It is not made super cheaply, a bit small for a child above toddler age. I wish I had really looked at the dimensions before buying, however that's my mistake. I would recommend this for children up to about age 5. Cute!
